alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued March 22 at 1:11PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 1200 PM WEDNESDAY UNTIL 800 PM WEDNESDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Elbert, Lincoln, Kit Carson, Cheyenne, Pueblo, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers, Las Animas, Baca, and eastern portions of El Paso, and Huerfano counties. Locations include, but are not limited to, Kiowa, Hugo, Burlington, Cheyenne Wells, Pueblo, Ordway, La Junta, Eads, Las Animas, Lamar, Trinidad, Springfield, and Walsenburg. WHEN...1200 PM Wednesday March 22 to 800 PM Wednesday March 22 IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Wednesday. The threat for blowing dust will gradually diminish by Wednesday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
